Change in LOE of key personnel acceptable

If no, an explanation is required.
If no, an explanation is required.

QuestionDef.QInstructions: If Yes, an explanation is required

QuestionDef.QText: Is there any restrictive term (on last award) requiring follow up?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: If Yes, an explanation is required
e.g. duplication of salary/stipend support, other scientific overlap. If Yes, an explanation is required.
Please Explain

QuestionDef.QInstructions: e.g. duplication of salary, concurrent effort, over commitment, etc?
Please Explain

QuestionDef.QText: Does the issuance of award require special documentation?
Is the research exempt, but not under E4?
Assurance status okay for all sites engaged in human subjects research?

QuestionDef.QInstructions: If Yes, special terms required for award.

QuestionDef.QInstructions: If No, signed concurrence memo and special terms required for award.

Concurrence memo required for award to be issued

Was transition built into this budget period?
